message: Dear Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a price that is slightly above its intrinsic value but still offers significant savings compared to the market rate. I look forward to your consideration.
Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. In light of your offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $925000. This price reflects the product's value while allowing us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and looks forward to your consideration.
Dear Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $915000. I believe this is a fair price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider it. In response, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $920000. This price allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin while acknowledging your valuation of the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Dear Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm willing to meet you at $915000, but I'd like to propose a slight adjustment to $915500. I believe this is a fair price that takes into account the value I place on the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. In response, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $917500. This price reflects a compromise that maintains a reasonable profit margin for us while considering the value you place on the product. I hope this proposal is satisfactory to you.
